message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a game-changer in its industry, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. It's a fair price, and I believe it's in both of our interests to come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 might be a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm happy to pay $10,500 for the product.  This is a good price for both of us and avoids us needing to negotiate any further.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $10,750. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth the investment.
